items.title: Patients Piling on the Pills in Middle Age: Are They Needed?
items.description: Twenty-five percent of patients are taking five or more drugs a day and the risk factors increase with each prescription. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Northern California Struggles to Keep Doctors Amid Cuts

items.title: Help Patients See Link Between Obesity and Varicose Veins
